name: anime-watch-parties
description: A cross-platform extension that synchronizes videos on major anime websites.

scripts.release: npm run build-extension && mkdirp built/Release/Firefox/ && rimraf built/Release/Firefox/Anime-Watch-Parties.xpi && jszip-cli add --noconfig --force -o built/Release/Firefox/Anime-Watch-Parties.xpi built/Firefox/src built/Firefox/LICENSE built/Firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build-extension: rimraf built/Firefox/ && mkdirp built/Firefox/ && npm run browserify-background-scripts && npm run browserify-web-accessible-resources && cpy --parents LICENSE manifest.json src/icons/* src/dependencies/* src/content-scripts/listener.js src/content-scripts/listener2.js src/popup/* built/Firefox/
scripts.browserify-background-scripts: mkdirp built/Firefox/src/background-scripts/ && cd src/background-scripts/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] clientScript.ts | exorcist ../../built/Firefox/src/background-scripts/background-script.js.map > ../../built/Firefox/src/background-scripts/background-script.js
scripts.browserify-web-accessible-resources: mkdirp built/Firefox/src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && cd src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] tabScript.ts | exorcist ../../../built/Firefox/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js.map > ../../../built/Firefox/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js

author: Dragicafit
